title: Review: The Mosaic RT1 ITR Road Bike Begs You To Meet Your Heroes
content:
It's a custom-made titanium road bike made in Boulder, Colorado. And it's every bit as good as you think it is.

Read the full article at Review: The Mosaic RT1 ITR Road Bike Begs You To Meet Your Heroes on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
